pageContext.claim: “When Joe Biden stops, if he has three, four people -- I mean, no, serious. He has the circles. You know the little circles? Which I love. The guy that does the circles, is very good, very neat. I'm a perfectionist. Nice, big, beautiful, yellow. They're very far apart, because he can't get any people. There's only five of 'em, and they have a hard time filling 'em up.”
pageContext.analysis: Biden campaign rallies are purposely smaller because he and his surrogates are following federal guidelines designed to prevent the spread of the coronavirus; Trump consistently ignores the guidelines and puts his supporters at risk. Trump also wildly overestimates the size of his crowds.
